column5: This guest cottage was once an art studio. It is very comfortable, cozy, quiet, and private. It is located on a 40 acre ranch with wonderful views, horses and abundant wildlife. I live on this ranch along with a long term renters residing in separate houses. The guest cottage is near houses but we are all very quiet and respectful of privacy. I am building trails on the property and I encourage my guests to get outside a take a stroll.
